title: Natwest Simple Font
content:
This is not about their famous rounded font, but about this simpler font used on some of their bills. Anyone know it?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20091026193735im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Untitled-2_5322.jpg)
author: Fontophile

comments.content:
[F25 Bank Printer](http://web.archive.org/web/20091026193735/http:/www.f25.cc/?F25_Fonts:Monospaced:F25_Bank_Printer) is quite close, but not an exact match...

—- Tamas Ferencz —-

It’s most likely a printer font (built-in) and not intended to be a digital font as we are used to for desktop work.

- Mike Yanega
Thanks to you both for the info. Atwe, I think that bank printer is close enough for my needs. Thanks again!
